mapper.select:
SELECT RNUM, a.P_SEQ, a.P_NAME, a.P_PRICE, a.C1_NAME, a.C2_NAME, a.C3_NAME, a.P_COLOR, a.CP_CODE, a.RDATE, SUM, WISH, a.BFS_PRICE, SALEPERCENT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY
a.P_SEQ DESC
a.P_PRICE DESC
a.P_PRICE ASC
SALEPERCENT ASC
SALEPERCENT DESC
) AS RNUM, a.P_NAME, a.P_PRICE, a.C1_NAME, a.C2_NAME, a.C3_NAME, a.P_COLOR, a.CP_CODE, a.RDATE, a.P_SEQ, SUM(b.QUANTITY) AS SUM, a.C_NAME, a.BFS_PRICE, (a.P_PRICE / a.BFS_PRICE) AS SALEPERCENT ,(SELECT COUNT(c.ID) FROM rhy_store_wishlist c WHERE c.P_SEQ = a.P_SEQ) as WISH
FROM rhy_store_product a INNER JOIN rhy_store_stock b ON a.P_SEQ = b.P_SEQ WHERE a.C_NAME = #{c_name}
AND (a.P_NAME LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or a.CP_CODE LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%')
AND a.P_NAME LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
AND a.CP_CODE LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
AND a.C1_NAME = #{c1_name}
AND a.BFS_PRICE != 0
GROUP BY a.P_SEQ ) A
ORDER BY
a.P_SEQ DESC
a.P_PRICE DESC
a.P_PRICE ASC
SALEPERCENT ASC
SALEPERCENT DESC

SELECT a.STOCK_SEQ, a.P_SEQ, a.SIZE, a.QUANTITY, IFNULL(SALES, 0) AS SALESVOLUME FROM(SELECT a.STOCK_SEQ, a.P_SEQ, a.SIZE, a.QUANTITY, (SELECT SUM(b.EA) AS SALES FROM rhy_payment_details b WHERE a.STOCK_SEQ = b.S_SEQ GROUP BY b.S_SEQ) AS SALES FROM rhy_store_stock a)A WHERE a.P_SEQ = #{p_seq}
SELECT C3_SEQ, C3_NAME, C2_SEQ FROM rhy_store_cate3 WHERE C2_SEQ = #{c2_seq}
SELECT P_NAME, P_TITLE, P_PRICE, P_COLOR, PHOTO1_FILE, C1_NAME, BFS_PRICE FROM rhy_store_product
SELECT C_NAME FROM rhy_mem_c WHERE ID = #{ id }
mapper.update: UPDATE rhy_store_product SET P_NAME = #{p_name}, CP_CODE = #{cp_code}, P_PRICE = #{p_price}, P_COLOR = #{p_color}, MDATE = #{mdate}, C1_NAME = #{c1_name}, C2_NAME = #{c2_name}, C3_NAME = #{c3_name} WHERE P_SEQ = #{p_seq}
